name: Azyrum Game
description:
Azyrum is a role-playing game in progress.

Explore the beautiful environment  and magical creatures of the Zheryum forest.

In a world of misery and loss where evil grows its seeds on the weakened souls, remember the power within you that your enemy will never possess. A soul it’s only lost if it doesn’t know it’s belonging, find your way back to your roots bringing back the ones you once lost.

Core game mechanics implemented although attack and defence are not.
